casebody.data:
Alphonse F. Girard vs. International Braid Company

Petition

No. 218 April 4, 1919 Por petitioner: Arehambault & Arehambault. Por respondent: Chas. R. Ballou.

RESCRIPT

TANNER, P. J.

Upon consideration of the testimony in this ease, including that of the expert appointed by the Court, we are of the opinion that the petitioner has sustained a total disability which entitles him to one-half his average weekly wage for the statutory period.
